about_the_game:
[h1]Rippers Resurrected Expedition: South Pacific[/h1]

SOMETHING'S STIRRING BENEATH THE WAVES...

Behind the idyllic, palm-studded shores of remote islands, an ancient evil plots its return. The protege of one of the Rippers' most notorious enemies seeks to revive his master's insidious experiments. The Rippers must track a lost expedition across the vast Pacific to stop him, and perhaps put an end to this evil forever.
Expedition: South Pacific is the next in a series of supplements that take the war with the Cabal to the most incredible and inaccessible places on Earth. Each book contains background information, new gear, hazards, monsters, and a complete Plot Point Campaign. It's designed to be used with the Expeditions supplement. and cards found for free on Pinnacle's website. Come aboard, and bring your speargun, this ship is sailing for dark waters.

To play, this book requires the Rippers Resurrected Player's Guide and the Rippers Resurrected Game Master's Handbook.
Converted by:   Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
